Title: Relates to requiring the department of homeless services to provide notice prior to locating transitional housing for the homeless in any hotel, motel or similar establishment
Summary: Relates to requiring the department of homeless services to provide notice prior to locating transitional housing for the homeless in any hotel, motel or similar establishment; requires notification in writing to the local community board and to city, state and federal elected officials.
LawCode: Add ยง21-324, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of homeless services to provide notice prior to locating transitional housing for the homeless in any hotel, motel or similar establishment
